# hv_vcpu_set_sme_zt0_reg(_:_:)

**Function**

Sets the value of the vCPU ZT0 register in streaming Scalable Vector Extension (SVE) mode.

## Declaration

```swift
func hv_vcpu_set_sme_zt0_reg(_ vcpu: hv_vcpu_t, _ value: UnsafePointer<hv_sme_zt0_uchar64_t>) -> hv_return_t
```

## Parameters

- **vcpu**: The ID of the vCPU instance.
- **value**: A pointer to the register value to set.

## Return Value

`HV_SUCCESS` on success, an error code otherwise.

## Discussion



This method returns an error if `PSTATE.ZA` is `0` (For example, if [doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_vcpu_sme_state_t/za_storage_enabled] is `false`).

This methods doesn’t require streaming SVE mode to be in an enabled state.
